articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: CalPERS Votes for Nelson Peltz and Jay Rasulo in Disney Boardroom Battle - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The vote gave Trian Partners another boost in its campaign, just days ahead of Disney’s annual shareholders meeting on April 3.
articles.content: The California Public Employees Retirement System (CalPERS) said the U.S. pension fund has voted to elect activist investor Nelson Peltz and Jay Rasulo to to the board of Walt Disney Company, Reuters… [+1585 chars]

articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.title: Apple Will Have To ‘Rethink’ iPhone 16 Design After New Oregon Repair Law - Forbes
articles.description: Oregon's law goes further than other right-to-repair legislation in that it's the first to ban a practice called parts pairing.
articles.content: iPhone 15 Pro Max smartphones on display inside the Apple Inc. Puerta del Sol store on the first day ... [+] of sale of the iPhone 15 smartphone in Madrid, Spain, on Friday, Sept. 22, 2023. Apple's l… [+5689 chars]
